title: cenni malai vAsanE
sahitya:
cenni malai vAsanE tAn ennidaya nEsanAvAn annavan ponnaDiyE en pughaliDamAghum


anupallavi

  innalE uTriDAda inba sukham uTriDavE inrum enrum avan iNaiyaDi paTriDuvEn


caraNam    tannigharE illAmal anbODaruL purindu tunbamellAm tIra tuNai tarum dIna bandhu
vanna mayilEri vITru vaLLi deivayAnaiyODu anbarai AtkoLLum aNNal AvAn avan
